beer.name: Issaquah Frog Family: Menage A Frog Ale
beer.description: WBC judges noted Menage A Frog was a "brilliant golden amber color. Inviting aromas of toasty baguette, orange blossom honey, and delicate bubblegum spice follow through on a round entry to a fruity-yet-dry medium-to-full body with caramel pear and peach custard tart notes. Finishes in a bold peppery spice, delicate grassy herbal and citrusy hops, and toffee fade with lingering warming alcohol. Very nice."
beer.yeast: Belgian Candi Sugar, Water and Abbey Yeast.
